spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The abhorrent overlord's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: 可憎的霸主可以感应到自己周围1,000英尺内有黄金存在。它可以确定哪个地方的黄金数量最多，并能感知到通往该地的方向。如果黄金正在被移动，它知道移动的方向。如果任何厚度的粘土或铅，即使是薄薄的一片，阻挡了它和黄金之间的直接路径，它也无法找到黄金。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 憎恶的霸主在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 憎恶的霸主用它的爪子进行两次攻击。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})坏死伤害。如果目标是生物，可憎的霸主会恢复相当于坏死伤害量一半的命中率。

action.name: Storm of Crows {@recharge}
entries: 憎恶的霸主在一个20英尺半径的球体中召唤出一群幽灵乌鸦和鹞子，这个球体以霸主能看到的120英尺内的一个点为中心。球体保持1分钟或直到霸主失去{@status concentration}(如同{@status concentration||concentrating}的法术)，其区域被轻度遮蔽和{@quickref difficult terrain||3}。
任何在一个回合中第一次进入该区域的生物，或在那里开始它的回合，都必须做一个{@dc 15}宪法救赎动作。蓄力失败时，生物会受到16({@damage 3d10})的砍击伤害和16({@damage 3d10})的精神伤害，蓄力成功时则受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Hold the Line
entries: 当跃迁者手持长矛时，其他生物在其5英尺范围内移动时，会挑起跃迁者的一次机会攻击。当跃迁者使用其长矛击中一个生物的机会攻击时，该生物会受到额外的4({@damage 1d8})穿刺伤害，并且该生物的速度在该回合的剩余时间内变为0。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 跳楼者可进行三次近战攻击或两次远程攻击。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}击中，达到5英尺，或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近战攻击，则为7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的生物，它必须成功地进行{@dc 13}力量投掷，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alseid's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: The alseid has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide while it is in grassland.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 阿尔塞德在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击上有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 艾尔西德会进行两次辐射式触摸攻击。

action.name: Radiant Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) 辐射伤害。

monster.name: Anvilwrought Raptor
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 猛禽用它的喙进行两次攻击。

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

variant.name: Anvilwrought Raptor Familiar
entries: 一些铁砧锻制的猛禽被明确地创造出来，作为家族成员。这种生物具有以下特征。

entries.name: Familiar
entries: 锻铁人可以作为一个熟悉的人为另一个生物服务，与它愿意的主人形成一种神奇的心灵感应的联系。当两者结合在一起时，主人可以感知铁砧锻工所感知的东西，只要他们在彼此1英里之内。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: 如果Aphemia的拯救动作失败，她可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 阿佩米亚在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿佩米亚进行了两次攻击：一次是用她的咬，一次是用她的爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})穿刺伤害加上13 ({@damage 3d8})坏死伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Discordant Song
entries: 阿佩米亚发出魔幻般的尖叫声。在她120英尺范围内的每个人形生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}智慧救赎，否则就会被她{@condition frightened}，直到歌曲结束。当阿普米亚在唱歌时，一个{@condition frightened}的生物在其回合开始时受到7({@damage 2d6})精神伤害。一个{@condition frightened}的生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。如果一个生物救赎成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对阿菲米亚的不和之歌免疫。阿菲米亚必须在她随后的回合中采取额外的行动来继续唱歌。她可以在任何时候停止唱歌。如果阿菲米亚是{@condition incapacitated}或死亡，则歌曲结束。

action.name: Grave Calling Song
entries: 阿佩米亚发出低沉的、咆哮的魔法旋律。在她周围300英尺范围内的每一个亡灵都必须在{@dc 14}智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被她控制，直到歌曲结束。阿普米亚必须在随后的回合中采取额外行动来继续唱歌，她可以在精神上指挥她所控制的亡灵，作为同一额外行动的一部分。她可以在任何时候停止唱歌。如果阿菲米亚被（1%）或死亡，则歌曲结束。

monster.name: Arasta

trait.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Arasta is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. In addition, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Arasta的拯救动作失败，她可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Arasta在面对法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Arasta可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒立在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Arasta无视由织带造成的移动限制。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿拉斯塔进行了三次攻击：一次是用她的牙齿咬，两次是用她的爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 21}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到32 ({@damage 5d12})的毒药伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。如果伤害将目标的命中率降至0，则目标在1小时内稳定但{@condition poisoned}，即使在恢复命中率后也是{@condition paralyzed}，而{@condition poisoned}是以这种方式。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7})砍击伤害。

action.name: Web of Hair {@recharge 4}
entries: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a 30-foot cube next to her. The web is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, its area is lightly obscured, and it lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition restrained} while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 21} Strength check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within 5 feet of it that is {@condition restrained} by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: 阿拉斯塔用她的爪子做了一次攻击。

legendary.name: Swarm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 阿拉斯塔使两个{@creature swarm of spiders||swarms of spiders}出现在她周围5英尺内无人的空间。

legendary.name: Toxic Web (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 阿拉斯塔的发网边上的每个生物{@condition restrained}会受到18({@damage 4d8})的毒伤害。

mythicHeader: If Arasta's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions, as long as she has temporary hit points from her Armor of Spiders.

mythic.name: Swipe
entries: 阿拉斯塔用她的爪子进行了两次攻击。

mythic.name: Web of Hair (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 阿拉斯塔给 "头发之网 "充电并使用它。

mythic.name: Nyx Weave (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 每个被阿拉斯塔的毛发之网攻击的生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 21}宪法救赎，否则该生物会受到26({@damage 4d12})的武力伤害，并且对其施加的任何6级或更低的法术都会结束。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 弓箭手在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

trait.name: Mount
entries: 如果弓箭手没有坐骑，它可以使用一个额外的动作，神奇地传送到作为其坐骑的生物上，前提是弓箭手和它的坐骑在同一个存在平面。当它传送时，大弓箭手会出现在坐骑上，以及它所穿戴或携带的任何装备。当坐骑不在{@condition incapacitated}时，大天使不能被{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，而且它和它的坐骑在灵巧救赎上都有优势。如果大弓箭手在骑乘其坐骑时被降低到0命中率，坐骑也会被降低到0命中率。

trait.name: Radiant Rebirth (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: 如果弓箭手的生命值降至0，它会恢复30点生命值，并在一阵光芒中重新站起来。在它30英尺范围内的每一个弓箭手选择的生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}宪法救赎中成功，否则该生物会受到13({@damage 3d8})的辐射伤害，并且在弓箭手的回合开始前会被{@condition blinded}。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 弓箭手用它的辐射矛进行两次攻击。

action.name: Radiant Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})辐射伤害。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 弓箭手进行镭射矛攻击或施放{@spell guiding bolt}。

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 弓箭手进行辐射矛攻击，然后它的坐骑可以用它的反应来进行近战武器攻击。

legendary.name: Return to Nyx (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 弓箭手使它能看到的30英尺范围内的尸体爆裂成辐射状的星雨，不留下任何痕迹。它所穿戴或携带的所有东西都会保留。尸体爆裂时，在其10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}灵巧的蓄力动作上取得成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d10})辐射伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ashen rider's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). The rider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Silence
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is {@condition deafened} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Mount
entries: 如果灰烬骑手没有坐骑，它可以使用一个额外的动作，神奇地传送到作为其坐骑的生物上，只要灰烬骑手和它的坐骑在同一个存在平面上。当它传送时，灰烬骑手会和它所穿戴或携带的任何装备一起出现在坐骑上。
在骑乘的时候，如果不是{@condition incapacitated}，灰烬骑手不能被{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，而且它和它的坐骑在灵巧投掷上都有优势。如果灰烬骑手在骑乘它的坐骑时被降低到0命中率，坐骑也会被降低到0命中率。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 灰烬骑士用它的灰烬之刃进行三次攻击或用它的灰烬之箭进行两次攻击。

action.name: Ashen Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害加上13 ({@damage 2d12})辐射伤害。

action.name: Bolt of Ash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10}击中，范围120英尺，一个生物。{@h}22 ({@damage 4d10})坏死伤害，并且目标不能恢复命中率，直到灰烬骑士的下一回合开始。

legendary.name: Attack
entries: 灰烬骑手使用其灰烬之刃或灰烬之箭进行攻击。

legendary.name: Coordinated Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 灰烬骑手使用它的灰烬之刃或灰烬之箭进行攻击，然后它的坐骑可以使用它的反应来进行近战武器攻击。

legendary.name: Reduce to Ash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 灰烬骑手的目标是它能看到的60英尺内的生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 18}宪法救赎中成功，否则它将受到27({@damage 5d10})的坏死伤害，并且它的最大命中率将减少，减少的量等于所受的坏死伤害。这种减少持续到目标完成长时间休息。如果目标的最大命中率降低到0，它的身体和它所穿戴和携带的一切，除了魔法物品，都会变成灰烬。变成灰烬的生物无法通过任何方式复活，除非使用{@spell wish}的法术。

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: 哈比在对任何没有全部命中率的生物进行近战攻击时具有优势。

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: 鹞子在对{@condition charmed}或{@condition frightened}的拯救动作上有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 哈比会进行两次近战攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Charge
entries: If Antigonos moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: 安提戈诺斯可以完美地回忆起他走过的任何道路。

trait.name: Reckless
entries: 在他的回合开始时，安提戈诺斯可以在他在该回合所做的所有近战武器攻击卷上获得优势，但对他的攻击卷有优势，直到他下一回合开始。

trait.name: Decrepit State
entries: 安提戈诺斯在他的攻击卷上有劣势。

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Amphora
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If there is not already a creature inside the amphora, the target is {@condition restrained} inside. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 14} Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, escaping from the amphora on a success. The effect also ends if the amphora is destroyed. The amphora has AC 8, 20 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

monster.name: Bronze Sable
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 当紫貂保持不动，它与普通的雕像没有区别。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sable has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sable's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the sable surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 貂蝉进行两次咬人攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

monster.name: Burnished Hart
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Charge
entries: 如果哈特向一个目标直线移动至少20英尺，然后在同一回合用鹿角攻击击中它，目标会受到额外的7({@damage 2d6})火焰伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 13}的力量反射中成功，否则就会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the hart or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The hart has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 野猪会进行两次攻击：一次用鹿角，一次用蹄子。

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害加上2 ({@damage 1d4})火焰伤害。

monster.name: Colossus of Akros
languages: understands Common and Celestial but can't speak

trait.name: Crumbling Destruction
entries: 当巨像的生命值下降到0时，它就会崩溃并被摧毁。任何在摇摇欲坠的雕像30英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个{@dc 22}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到22({@damage 4d10})的重击伤害和22({@damage 4d10})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: 每当巨像受到火灾伤害时，它不会受到任何伤害，反而会恢复与所受火灾伤害相等的打击点数。

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: 巨像对任何会改变其形态的法术或效果都是免疫的。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 巨人的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: 巨人对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿克罗斯的巨像进行了两次近战攻击。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 16}击中，达到15英尺，或范围200/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近战攻击，则为27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9})穿刺伤害。如果巨像用此矛进行远程攻击，攻击后矛会神奇地回到它的手中。

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}36 ({@damage 6d8 + 9})砍击伤害。

action.name: Flames of Akros {@recharge}
entries: 魔法火焰从巨像身上发出，射向90英尺范围内巨像能看到的最多三个生物。每个目标必须做一个{@dc 24}灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败会受到36({@damage 8d8})的火焰伤害，如果蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。拯救失败时，目标也会神奇地着火，持续1分钟。在此后的每个回合结束时，燃烧的目标会重复拯救动作。拯救失败时，它将受到18{@damage 4d8}的火焰伤害，拯救成功时，效果结束。

trait.name: Aura of Erebos
entries: 任何在巨人10英尺范围内开始其回合的生物，必须成功进行{@dc 18}宪法救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的坏死伤害，并且在其下一回合开始前无法恢复命中率。如果救赎成功，该生物将在24小时内免疫于巨人的埃雷伯斯光环。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 巨人在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击上有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巨人进行了两次猛烈的攻击。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})重击伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Noxious Gust {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant exhales a mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: 吞噬希望的人可以感应到自己周围1000英尺内有黄金存在。它能确定哪个地方的黄金数量最多，并能感应到通往该地的方向。如果黄金正在被移动，它知道移动的方向。如果任何厚度的粘土或铅，即使是薄薄的一片，阻挡了它和黄金之间的直接路径，它也无法定位黄金。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 希望之食者在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 希望之食者用它的爪子进行两次攻击。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Breath of Hopelessness {@recharge 5}
entries: 希望之食者在30英尺的范围内呼出地下世界的风的瘴气。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 14}魅力救赎动作。如果救赎失败，目标会受到26({@damage 4d12})的坏死伤害并被诅咒1分钟。在被诅咒期间，每当希望之食者用攻击击中目标时，目标会受到额外的6({@damage 1d12})坏死伤害。拯救成功后，目标会受到一半的伤害，并且不会被诅咒。

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The lion has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: 有了10英尺的跑步起点，狮子可以跳远到25英尺。

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: 狮子对任何只针对狮子（不是一个区域）的法术的救赎有优势。如果狮子的蓄力成功，并且该法术是4级或以下的，那么该法术对狮子没有影响，而是针对施法者。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 狮子进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是用爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

legendary.name: Claw
entries: 狮子进行一次爪子攻击。

legendary.name: Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 狮子发出一种神奇的吼声。在狮子60英尺范围内的每个生物，如果能听到吼声，就必须在一个{@dc 12}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被狮子{@condition frightened}，直到狮子的下一回合结束。

monster.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果Eidolon受到的效果允许它做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果蓄力动作成功，Eidolon将不会受到任何伤害，如果失败，则只有一半的伤害。如果它是{@condition incapacitated}，它就不能使用这个特性。

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Eidolon在面对任何变成亡灵的效果时都有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 伊多龙会进行两次近战攻击。在一次攻击之前或之后，如果可以的话，它可以使用 "闪电步"。

action.name: Flickering Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害加上3 ({@damage 1d6})精神伤害。

action.name: Flitterstep {@recharge 5}
entries: 伊多龙神奇地传送到它能看到的30英尺范围内无人的空间。如果它在传送后立即进行攻击，它在攻击卷上有优势。

monster.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Eidolon在面对任何变成亡灵的效果时都有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 伊多龙进行两次鬼刀攻击。

action.name: Ghostblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害加上11 ({@damage 2d10})力量伤害。

monster.name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the sentinel moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: 哨兵对任何只针对哨兵（而不是一个区域）的法术的蓄力攻击具有优势。如果哨兵的蓄力成功，并且该法术是4级或以下的，那么该法术对哨兵没有影响，而是针对施法者。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 哨兵进行两次冲撞攻击。

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 哨兵在15英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到27({@damage 6d8})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 海马能呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Charge
entries: 如果海马向一个目标移动至少20英尺，然后在同一回合用冲撞攻击击中该目标，该目标会受到额外的7（{@damage 2d6}）的重击伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 12}力量救赎中成功，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})重击伤害。

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})重击伤害。

trait.name: Reactive
entries: 巨人在战斗中的每一回合都可以做出一个反应。

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The giant can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巨人进行四次长剑攻击或两次岩石攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8})砍击伤害。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13}击中，范围60/240英尺，一个目标。{@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8})重击伤害。如果目标是生物，它必须成功地进行一个{@dc 21}力量投掷，或被击倒{@condition prone}。

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: 巨人在对抗一次会击中它的武器攻击时，其攻击力增加5。要做到这一点，巨人必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

monster.name: Hythonia

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hythonia's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). She can innately cast {@spell animate objects} once per day requiring no material components.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Hythonia的拯救动作失败，她可以选择成功代替。

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic. Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

trait.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If Hythonia is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Hythonia进行了三次攻击：一次是用她的爪子，一次是收缩，还有一次是用她的蛇形头发。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})砍击伤害加上4 ({@damage 1d8})毒药伤害。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 11}击中，到达15英尺，一个大型或小型生物。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})重击伤害，并且目标是{@condition grappled}（逃跑{@dc 19}）。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，并在每个回合开始时受到15({@damage 3d6 + 5})的打击伤害，而且海索尼亚不能束缚另一个目标。

action.name: Snaky Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5})重击伤害，如果目标是大型或小型生物，Hythonia可以将目标拉到离她最多5英尺处。

legendary.name: Move
entries: Hythonia移动到她的速度，不会引起机会攻击。

legendary.name: Snaky Hair
entries: Hythonia用她的蛇形头发做了一次攻击。

legendary.name: Petrified Earth (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Hythonia causes stone spikes to erupt from the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on her. The area becomes {@quickref difficult terrain||3} until the start of her next turn. Any creature, other than Hythonia, takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage for every 5 feet it moves on those spikes.

mythicHeader: If Hythonia's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Shed Skin.

mythic.name: Numbing Claws
entries: 海瑟尼亚用她的爪子进行两次攻击。如果两次攻击都击中了同一个生物，它将受到额外的7({@damage 2d6})毒药伤害，并且必须在DC18宪法救赎中成功，否则将变成{@condition paralyzed}，直到她下一回合开始。

mythic.name: Look at Me (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Hythonia can force a sighted creature she has {@condition grappled} to see her eyes and be affected by her gaze.

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: 当九头蛇受到穿刺或砍击伤害时，九头蛇周围5英尺内的每个生物都会受到9({@damage 2d8})的酸液伤害。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: 水螅能憋气1小时。

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: 九头蛇有五个头。当它有一个以上的头时，九头蛇对被{@condition blinded}、{@condition charmed}、{@condition deafened}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition stunned}或被击倒{@condition unconscious}的救赎有优势。每当九头蛇在一个回合内受到35次或更多的伤害，它的一个头就会死亡。如果它所有的头都死了，九头蛇就会死亡。在它的回合结束时，除非它在上一回合后受到火的伤害，否则它每死一个头就会长出两个头。九头蛇每重新长出一个头，就会恢复10点生命值。

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: 九头蛇每超过一个头，就会得到一个额外的反应，只能用于机会攻击。

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: 虽然九头蛇在睡觉，但它至少有一个头是醒着的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 九头蛇有多少个头，就会有多少次咬人的攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lampad的法术能力是魅力（{@hit 6}用法术攻击命中）。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

trait.name: Corpse Stride
entries: 在它的回合中，灯神可以使用10英尺的移动距离，神奇地踏入它所能触及的一个生物的尸体，并从第一个尸体60英尺内的第二个生物的尸体中出来，出现在第二个尸体5英尺内的一个无人空间。两具尸体必须是中型或更大。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，LAMPAD的蓄力攻击有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 灯神用它的坏死触摸或寒冰触摸攻击两次。

action.name: Necrotic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})坏死性伤害。

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6}击中，范围120英尺，一个生物。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d8})坏死伤害，并且目标不能恢复命中率，直到lampad的下一个回合开始。如果目标是亡灵，它在对Lampad的攻击中处于劣势，直到Lampad的下一回合结束。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The leonin's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果利安人受到的效果允许它做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，那么如果蓄力动作成功，它就不会受到伤害，如果失败，它就会受到一半的伤害。如果它是{@condition incapacitated}，它就不能使用这个特性。

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: 当列宁没有穿戴盔甲和挥舞盾牌的时候，它的攻击力包括它的智慧修正值。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 列宁会进行三次武器攻击。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})砍击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})力量伤害。

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7}击中，范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。

items.name: Multiattack
entries: 美杜莎可以进行三次近战攻击--一次用蛇毛，一次收缩，一次用短剑，或者用长弓进行两次远程攻击。

items.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})重击伤害，并且目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 11})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标为{@condition restrained}，并且冥王不能束缚另一个目标。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hoplite is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 跃迁者可进行三次武器攻击。它可以用冰霜之光代替一次武器攻击。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近战攻击，则为7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。如果目标是中等或较小的生物，它必须成功地进行{@dc 13}力量投掷，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5}击中，范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d8})的寒冷伤害，并且目标的速度降低10英尺，直到跳楼者的下一个回合开始。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naiad's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 奈德人可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The naiad is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Naiad在对抗法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Naiad进行两次精神接触攻击。

action.name: Psychic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})精神伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shepherd's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Nightmares
entries: 在牧羊人30英尺范围内的不死生物获得攻击和伤害卷的+5奖励。当任何其他非亡灵或构造物的生物在牧羊人30英尺范围内开始其回合时，该生物必须成功进行{@dc 17}智慧救赎，否则会受到11({@damage 2d10})精神伤害。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 牧羊人在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 牧羊人进行两次攻击：一次用爪子，一次用杖子。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})砍击伤害加上16 ({@damage 3d10})坏死伤害。

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})重击伤害，如果双手使用，则为13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害，外加26 ({@damage 4d12})精神伤害。

action.name: Herd the Underworld (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The shepherd pulls twisted souls from the Underworld; {@dice 1d6} {@creature shadow||shadows} (without Sunlight Weakness) arise in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the shepherd. The shadows act right after the shepherd on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the shepherd dies.

trait.name: Charge
entries: 如果公羊向一个目标直线移动至少20英尺，然后在同一回合用公羊攻击击中该目标，该目标会受到额外的5({@damage 2d4})重击伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 13}力量救赎中成功，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 公羊在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，有优势。

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The ram has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})重击伤害加上3 ({@damage 1d6})力量伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oracle's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blessings of the Gods
entries: While the oracle is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier. In addition, a creature that hits the oracle with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

action.name: Eldritch Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})武力伤害。

reaction.name: Divine Insight (3/Day)
entries: 当神谕或它能看到的生物进行攻击卷、蓄力投掷或能力检查时，神谕可以使该卷以优势或劣势进行。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oread's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Invisible in Fire
entries: The oread is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in fire.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 食人族在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥雷德用它的火热之触或火弹攻击两次。

action.name: Fiery Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})火焰伤害。

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6}击中，范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d10})火焰伤害。

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (2nd-Level Spell; 1/Day)
entries: 当奥瑞德被它能看到的60英尺范围内的生物伤害时，伤害奥瑞德的生物必须做一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败时受到16({@damage 3d10})的火焰伤害，成功时受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
entries: 任何在菲拉斯基亚10英尺范围内开始行动的生物必须做一个{@dc 15}智慧救赎动作。拯救成功时，该生物在接下来的24小时内对该光环免疫。如果救赎失败，该生物在救赎中处于劣势，其速度减半，直到其下一回合开始。

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: 如果伤害将葡萄架降至0命中率，它必须做一个宪法救赎，DC等于5+所受伤害，除非伤害是辐射或来自关键打击。如果成功，葡萄架会下降到1点生命值。

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The phylaskia can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 菲拉斯奇亚会进行两次长剑攻击，并使用一次力量消耗。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})砍击伤害，外加11 ({@damage 2d10})坏死伤害。

action.name: Strength Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})坏死伤害。除非目标对坏死伤害免疫，否则其力量值会减少{@dice 1d4}。如果这使其力量降低到0，目标就会死亡。否则，这种降低会持续到目标完成短期或长期休息。

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: When Polukranos takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of Polukranos takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Polukranos可以憋气1小时。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Polukranos的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Polukranos有五个头。当它有一个以上的头时，Polukranos对被{@condition blinded}、{@condition charmed}、{@condition deafened}、{@condition frightened}、{@condition stunned}或被击倒{@condition unconscious}的救赎有优势。每当Polukranos在一个回合中受到40或更多的伤害，它的一个头就会死亡。如果它的所有头颅都死亡，则波鲁克兰诺斯也会死亡。在它的回合结束时，它每死一个头就长出两个头，除非它在上一回合后受到40或更多的火焰伤害。Polukranos每重新长出一个头，就会恢复20点生命值。

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: Polukranos每拥有一个以上的头颅，就会得到一个额外的反应，只能用于进行机会攻击。

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Polukranos对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: 当Polukranos睡觉的时候，它至少有一个头是醒着的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Polukranos的咬人攻击次数与它的头一样多。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7})重击伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7})重击伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在{@dc 21}的力量反射中成功，或者被推到离波鲁克诺斯20英尺的地方。

legendary.name: Detect

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: 波鲁克拉诺斯进行了一次尾部攻击。

legendary.name: Trampling Charge (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Polukranos在一条直线上最多可移动50英尺，并可在任何巨大或较小的生物的空间内移动。在这个移动过程中，它第一次进入每个生物的空间时，可以对该生物进行一次踩踏攻击。

entries: 如果萨提尔表演了至少1分钟，它可以在60英尺范围内选择最多四个观看或聆听了整个表演的人类。每个目标必须在一个{@dc 13}的智慧救赎上成功，否则就会被{@condition charmed}。当{@condition charmed}这样做的时候，目标会崇拜萨提尔，并会参加萨提尔的狂欢。1小时后，如果该生物受到任何伤害，如果萨提尔攻击目标，或者如果目标看到萨提尔攻击或伤害目标的任何盟友，则{@condition charmed}条件结束。

action.name: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 萨提尔射出一支箭，在30英尺的范围内神奇地转化为一堆飞弹。该区域内的每个生物必须做一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到17({@damage 5d6})的穿刺伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

entries: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})毒药伤害。

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: 奇美拉对任何只针对奇美拉（而不是一个区域）的法术的救赎具有优势。如果奇美拉的蓄力成功，并且该法术是4级或以下的，那么该法术对奇美拉没有影响，而是针对施法者。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奇美拉会进行三次攻击：一次用爪子，一次用头，一次用尾巴。当它的呼吸武器可用时，它可以用呼吸来代替它的头或爪子。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Head
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: 奇美拉在15英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到32({@damage 5d12})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 鳟鱼可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons {@dice 1d4} {@creature water weird||water weirds}. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 特里顿使用 "波浪之触 "进行两次攻击，并施放{@spell ray of frost}。

action.name: Wave Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}22 ({@damage 4d10})寒冷伤害。

action.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7}击中，范围60英尺，一个生物。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d8})的寒冷伤害，并且目标的速度降低10英尺，直到特里顿的下一个回合开始。

reaction.name: Frigid Shield
entries: When a creature the triton can see targets the triton with an attack, the triton gains 10 temporary hit points. If the attack hits and reduces the temporary hit points to 0, each creature within 5 feet of the triton takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The triton's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 鳟鱼可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: 三角兽可以在它的每个回合中采取脱离或隐藏行动作为奖励行动。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 三角兽进行两次海胆短剑攻击。

action.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})毒药伤害。如果伤害使生物的命中率降至0，则该生物在1小时内稳定但{@condition poisoned}，即使在重新获得命中率后也是{@condition paralyzed}，同时{@condition poisoned}以这种方式。

action.name: Poisoned Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围30/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})毒药伤害。

monster.name: Tromokratis

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 特罗莫克拉蒂斯可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Tromokratis挽救失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 特罗莫克拉提斯的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Tromokratis对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

trait.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries: Tromokratis在对抗法术时有优势，而任何对Tromokratis进行法术攻击的生物在攻击卷上都有劣势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tromokratis进行三次攻击：一次用钳子，一次用尾巴，一次用触手抓。

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 18}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10})重击伤害，如果目标是生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 26})。在抓捕结束前，目标为{@condition restrained}，特罗莫克拉蒂斯不能对其他人使用此攻击。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10})重击伤害，如果目标是生物，会被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Tentacle Grasp
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 18}击中，到达20英尺，一个生物。{@h}20({@damage 3d6 + 10})重击伤害，目标{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 26})。如果目标在下一回合结束前没有逃脱，Tromokratis会将目标在一条直线上抛出最多60英尺。目标落地{@condition prone}并受到21({@damage 6d6})的击打伤害。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Tromokratis移动到其一半的速度。

legendary.name: Tail
entries: 特罗莫克拉蒂斯进行了一次尾部攻击。

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 特罗莫克拉蒂斯进行一次咬合攻击。

mythicHeader: If Tromokratis's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Hearts of the Kraken.

mythic.name: Rampage
entries: Tromokratis进行了两次攻击：一次用它的尾巴，一次用它的触手抓。

mythic.name: Coral Growth (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 每个在Tromokratis 10英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个DC 25的灵巧救赎，救赎失败会受到13({@damage 3d8})的砍伤，救赎成功则受到一半的伤害。直到下一回合开始，Tromokratis和它的心获得+2的AC奖励。

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，地狱犬可以以它的速度向它能看到的敌方生物移动。

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: 地狱犬不能被{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，而且它对被击倒的救赎有优势{@condition unconscious}。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 地狱犬会进行两次咬合攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害加上2 ({@damage 1d4})火焰伤害。

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 12} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 霸王龙在其回合开始时恢复20点生命值。如果它受到辐射伤害，这个特性在它下一回合开始时不会起作用。只有在它的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生的情况下才会死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 霸王龙会进行三次攻击：一次是用它的扑咬，一次是收缩，还有一次是用它的大嘴。

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}35 ({@damage 8d6 + 7})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达15英尺，一个大型或小型生物。{@h}17({@damage 3d6 + 7})重击伤害，并且目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 19})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，并在其每个回合开始时受到17({@damage 3d6 + 7})的打击伤害。霸王龙最多可以让两个生物受到束缚。

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7})穿刺伤害加上19 ({@damage 3d12})酸液伤害。

monster.name: Underworld Cerberus
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，地狱犬可以以它的速度向它能看到的敌方生物移动。

trait.name: Multiheaded
entries: 地狱犬不能被{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，而且它对被击倒的救赎有优势{@condition unconscious}。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 地狱犬会进行三次咬合攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺伤害加上3 ({@damage 1d6})火焰伤害。

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition restrained} by the hardening rock. A creature can make a {@dc 15} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: 哀伤之黾张开的嘴创造了一个反魔法的区域，就像{@spell antimagic field}法术一样，在一个60英尺的圆锥中。在它的每个回合开始时，悲哀之黾决定圆锥体的方向，以及它的嘴是张开还是闭上。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The woe strider makes two claw attacks and one bite attack. If both claws hit the same creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害加上3 ({@damage 1d6})精神伤害。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物是{@condition grappled}、{@condition incapacitated}或{@condition restrained}。{@h}13({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺伤害加上16({@damage 3d10})精神伤害。此外，该生物携带的每个非神器的魔法物品的魔法属性被抑制1分钟。
